sentences.sContent: With simple supplies like scrap book paper and paint, you can easily convert them into chic and affordable gift boxes, flower vases or handy dispensers.
sentences.sContent_eng: With simple supplies like scrap book paper and paint, you can easily convert them into chic and affordable gift boxes, flower vases or handy dispensers.
sentences.sCn: 用废书刊剪报或者涂料，你可以很容易地将其转换成别致的并且负担得起的礼品盒，花瓶或简易分类罐。

words.tran: 矫揉；时髦的人；过度精巧的东西

trans.tranCn: 别致的款式(尤指妇女的服饰)
